title: Leavuyebuster
body: I was just playing league before and I had an error says something about disconnecting from the server so i couldn't join the match. So i restarted client and then i got a leavebuster from this usually i dont. Before you say just stop leaving games i didnt leave teh game i got disconnected....and i got a leavebuster.HALP MEH RIOT

replies.body:
If you take more than five minutes to send another command to your champion from the last command you sent to them, then you are marked as having "left" the game. Harsh and unruly; I think it should be changed.

Are you still getting disconnections from games?
